content: With that said, our contribution margin a non-GAAP measurement of operating performance decreased 0.1% to $105.8 million or 39.4% of net sales in the fiscal fourth quarter, from $105.9 million or 38.7% of net sales in the comparable year ago period. Our adjusted EBITDA, a non-GAAP measurement of operating performance, totaled $26.9 million or 10% of net sales in the fourth quarter 2022, compared to $26 million or 9.5% of net sales in the comparable year ago period. And for the full year ended December 30, 2022, adjusted net income decreased 1.9% to $52.6 million or 4.7% of net sales from $53.6 million or 5.3% of net sales, again in the comparable year ago period.
